title: Colorado Firm Recalls Fettuccini Alfredo With Chicken Products Due To Misbranding and Undeclared Allergens
summary: WASHINGTON, April 2, 2014 American Outdoor Products, a Boulder, Colo., establishment, is recalling approximately 633 pounds of dehydrated Fettuccini Alfredo with Chicken due to misbranding and undeclared allergens, the U.S. Department of Agriculture's Food Safety and Inspection Service (FSIS) announced today. The products were formulated...
impacted_products: 7.5-oz. foil pouches of  “Backpackers Pantry Fettuccini Alfredo with Chicken”
